item.title: Report X-2024101281
item.description:
Report X-2024101281

Identified by scraper @ 2024-10-22T09:15:04+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-10-12
  • City: LOUISVILLE
  • State: KY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: A THE UPS WORLDPORT FACILITY IN LOUISVILLE, KY, RESPONDED TO A LEAKING AIR DANGEROUS GOODS PACKAGE THAT WAS MARKED AND LABELED AS CONSUMER COMMODITY ID8000 WITH A CLASS 9 DIAMOND LABEL, AIR LIMITED QUANTITY MARKING, AND SHIPPERS DECLARATION. THE DANGEROUS GOODS PACKAGE HAD PREVIOUSLY PASSED AN ACCEPTANCE AUDIT AT THE ORIGIN FACILITY. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED (1) 500 ML BOTTLE OF FLAMMABLE SWEET JASMINE PRIVATE COLLECTION PARDUM D'INTERIEUR LEAKING FROM THE CLOSURE.
